text: Ngakho-ke ukube kwakungekho phakathi kwezizukulwane ngaphambilini kwenu abahlakaniphileyo abanqabela (abanye) ekwenzeni ukona emhlabeni ngaphandle kwabambalwa phakathi kwalabo esabasindisa phakathi kwabo, futhi labo abayizoni babelandela injabulo ababekuyona (yempilo yalomhlaba) futhi babeyizoni
